## Erc1155.setRestrictedTransfer() method

Set whether NFTs in this Contract can be transferred or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setRestrictedTransfer(restricted?: boolean): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  restricted | boolean | whether to restrict or allow transfers |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TransactionResult&gt;
